body_html:
I've solved the problem. Every time I installed CUDA, my 2nd monitor (plugged into a GTX 330) would stop working, but tensorflow-gpu would work.

After this I would try to get the 2nd monitor to work by updating its driver which would then cause importing tensorflow to fail. Looks like tensorflow doesn't play well with this GPU, probably cause its so old.
body_text:

After this I would try to get the 2nd monitor to work by updating its driver which would then cause importing tensorflow to fail.  Looks like tensorflow doesn't play well with this GPU, probably cause its so old.
body:
I've solved the problem.  Every time I installed CUDA, my 2nd monitor (plugged into a GTX 330) would stop working, but tensorflow-gpu would work.

After this I would try to get the 2nd monitor to work by updating its driver which would then cause importing tensorflow to fail.  Looks like tensorflow doesn't play well with this GPU, probably cause its so old.
